CustomField.formula: "calendly.com/" & Calendly_User__c & "_orderbird_pay/anmeldung_orderbird_pay?sfid=" & Id & "&name=" & Account.Primary_Contact__r.FirstName & "+" & Account.Primary_Contact__r.LastName & "&email=" & Account.Primary_Contact__r.Email & "&a1=" & Account.Primary_Contact__r.Phone & "&a2=" & Account.Name & "&a3=" & Account.CustomerID__c & "&a4=" & Account.VAT_number_USt_ID__c
CustomField.label: AccM Calendly RAW link
